-- Main Activity, Start Menu, Opening Menu Settings// Player 1 Player 2 Sign In Create Account Pick a Matrix Size Username: Password: Test: End Grid Size: How To How To Play STEAMPUNKED Steampunked is played by placing pipes on the grid with the goal of connecting your start pipe with the end pipe, to make the steam disappear.
\n\nA player wins if the start and end pipes of the player are successfully connected and the Open Valve button is pushed, such that no steam appears from the pipes of the player pushing the Open Valve button. If steam appears when the Open Valve button is pushed, the other player automatically wins. Pushing Install will snap a pipe to the closest grid square on the playing field, as well as line up the pipe rotation to the nearest 90 degree alignment multiple when snapping in. Pushing Discard will discard the currently selected pipe and will produce a new pipe in the available pipe pool. If a player pushes the Surrender button, the player forfeits the game. The other player wins automatically in this situation.
\n\nPush Start Game to start playing now!
